column4: I torrented kubuntu-8.04 and I now seem to be running out of space. So, I deleted the file from my home directory, but not much difference seems to have been made to the amount of free space I have.
check trash folders, you might have just moved the file somewhere else instead of deleting it
I can see why you say that, but there's very, very little data in /home
well, if you deleted it but it didn't free up any space, it's probably around there somewhere
